snippet: Miss Lear became a star in Europe and won acclaim in the United States for singing some of the most difficult roles in contemporary opera.
abstract: Evelyn Lear, versatile operatic soprano, dies at age 86.
lead_paragraph: Miss Lear became a star in Europe and won acclaim in the United States for singing some of the most difficult roles in contemporary opera.

headline.seo: Evelyn Lear, Versatile Soprano, Dies at 86
